page.title: 14MY DAY -MARIE CHAPMAN AGE 14
page.content: I GOT UP AT 7.30 .HAD A WASH AND GOT DRESSED WENT DOWN STAIRS AND HAD BREAKFAST. I HAD CORN FLAKES AND A CUP OF TEA. I THEN CHECKED I HAD EVERY THING I NEEDED FOR SCHOOL .AND THEN LEFT AT 8.30 .MY FIRST LESSON THAT DAY WAS HUMANITIES I WAS GOING OUT TO A HEALTH CLINIC TO FIND OUT SOME INFORMATION ABOUT DRUGS ,SO WE COULD WORK ON OUR PROJECT.THEN IHAD BREAK THEN IT WAS TIME FOR THE NEXT LESSON TYPING.AT 12.30 I WENT HOME FOR DINNER.I HAD A QUICK SNACK,THEN I LEFT AT 1.40 TO GET BACK SCHOOL.MY FIRST LESSON THAT AFTERNOOM WAS LCS AND MY LAST LESSON WAS ALSO LSC AT 3.30 I LEFT FOR HOME .AS SOON AS I ARRIVED HOME MY DINNER WAS ON THE TABLE. AFTER I HAD FINISHED I HELPED TO WASH THE POTS.FOR THE REST OF THAT EVENING I WATCHED T.V.THEN I WENT BED AT 10.30 .AGED 14.
